message: Let's start with a fair, but generous, split. I hope you'll accept this offer.
I'm going to counter with a more even split. Let's see if you're willing to be a little more fair.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise a bit. This offer is still more favorable for me, but I'm considering the value of your time. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to split the money evenly.  If you don't accept, we both lose money to inflation.  Let's be reasonable.
